synopsis.text:
And so begins the intriguing tale of Detective Conan's eleventh OVA, "A Secret Order from London." In this thrilling chapter, our beloved characters find themselves in the midst of a perplexing predicament. Conan, Ran, Kogorou, and Agasa embark on a journey to the bustling city of London, following an invitation from a familiar face. Meanwhile, Mitsuhiko and Genta stumble upon a magazine article featuring a child star, Grace Aihara, whose uncanny resemblance to their friend Haibara raises suspicion.

Back in Japan, Haibara's temporary stay with Ayumi is disrupted by the ominous presence of a man in black, Youji Kurokawa, who seems to have his sights set on her. As the plot thickens, Mitsuhiko and Genta receive a cryptic warning to keep Haibara away from the professor's house at all costs. With shadowy figures lurking around every corner, can the detective boys protect their friend and unravel the mystery surrounding the enigmatic Grace Aihara? Join Conan and friends as they navigate through this gripping adventure, filled with suspense, deception, and unexpected twists.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
